faqs.question: How do I know if I need roof repair or full replacement?
faqs.answer: If damage is localized (small leaks, limited shingle loss), repair may work. If your roof is older, has widespread wear, repeated leaks, or storm-related structural issues, replacement is often the smarter long-term option.

faqs.question: How long does a roof replacement take in {{CITY}}?
faqs.answer: Most residential roof replacements take 1–2 days depending on roof size, material, weather, and decking condition. We provide a clear timeline after inspection.

faqs.question: Do you provide free roof inspections in {{CITY}}, {{STATE}}?
faqs.answer: Yes—{{COMPANY_NAME}} offers a roof evaluation and recommendations. Call {{PHONE}} to schedule.

faqs.question: What roofing materials do you install?
faqs.answer: We install asphalt shingles, metal roofing, tile roofing, and flat roofing systems (TPO/EPDM/PVC) depending on the property type and your goals.

faqs.question: Can you help with storm damage roof repair?
faqs.answer: Yes. We handle wind and storm-related damage, emergency leak control, and full restoration options based on the roof’s condition.

faqs.question: How much does roof repair usually cost?
faqs.answer: Cost depends on leak location, damage extent, material type, and roof pitch. After inspection, we provide a clear estimate—no guesswork.

faqs.question: How often should I get my roof inspected?
faqs.answer: We recommend at least once per year, plus after major storms. Regular inspections catch small issues before they become expensive.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency roof repair services?
faqs.answer: Yes. If your roof is actively leaking or storm-damaged, call {{PHONE}} for fast help and temporary protection if needed.

faqs.question: Will you replace rotten roof decking?
faqs.answer: If we find damaged decking during replacement, we’ll document it and replace what’s necessary to keep your roof structurally sound.

faqs.question: What warranties do you offer?
faqs.answer: Warranty options vary by roofing system and manufacturer. We explain both material warranties and workmanship coverage before the job starts.

faqs.question: Do you install metal roofs on existing roofs?
faqs.answer: In some cases, metal retrofitting is possible. We’ll inspect your current roof structure and recommend the safest approach.

faqs.question: Do you work on commercial flat roofs in {{CITY}}?
faqs.answer: Yes. We install and repair TPO, EPDM, PVC, coatings, and drainage improvements for commercial properties.

faqs.question: How do you protect landscaping and clean up after the job?
faqs.answer: We use tarps, magnetic nail sweeps, and careful debris removal. Final cleanup is part of every project.

faqs.question: Can you fix roof ventilation or attic airflow problems?
faqs.answer: Yes. Poor ventilation can shorten roof life and increase energy bills. We assess intake/exhaust ventilation and recommend upgrades.

faqs.question: Do you install or repair gutters too?
faqs.answer: Yes. We install and repair gutters and downspouts to improve drainage and prevent water damage to the roof and foundation.

faqs.question: What signs of roof damage should I watch for?
faqs.answer: Water stains on ceilings, missing shingles, granules in gutters, sagging roof lines, flashing damage, and mold odors are common signs.

faqs.question: Is financing available?
faqs.answer: Yes, financing options may be available—ask our team about flexible payment plans for your project.

faqs.question: How do do I book an estimate with {{COMPANY_NAME}}?
faqs.answer: Call {{PHONE}} or request a quote online. We’ll schedule an inspection at a time that works for you.
